title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When opening the Project Properties Info page, text fields are being used instead of readonly fields for displaying information like Path, Type, etc.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use readonly fields instead of text fields to display information like Path, Type, etc.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and choose Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the fields for Path, Type, etc. are editable text fields instead of readonly fields.
